concept.title: Creating profiles
concept.shortdesc: Create at least two profiles, one to act as the deployment manager for the node and the others as the federated servers.

conbody.p: After you install WebSphere Network Deployment, create at least two profiles. One profile acts as the deployment manager for the node, the others act as the federated servers.
Crest the profiles by using the Profile Creation Wizard, which you start the pct<hardware platform> file from the bin/ProfileCreator directory of the WebSphere Application Server installation.
The first choice when using this wizard is to either create:
The second is the choice to enable administrative security. Enable administrative security on profile creation. These settings can be changed later.
